content: You must use `gpt-3.5-turbo-0125`, even if the AI Proxy only supports `gpt-4o-mini`. Use the OpenAI API directly for this question. For calculating tokens, use a tokenizer similar to what Prof. Anand demonstrated to count the input tokens and multiply by 50 cents per million tokens.

To calculate the cost: 1. Use the tokenizer to count input tokens 2. Multiply the token count by (50 cents / 1 million) to get the cost in cents. For example, if your input has 36 tokens, the cost would be: (36 * 50) / 1000000 = 0.0018 cents.
